titles.title: Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026
Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026
Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026
Making appropriations for the Department of the Interior, environment, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Appropriations reported an original measure, H. Rept. 119-215, by Mr. Simpson.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 175.
